name: Monster School Lost and Found
description:
"After school each day the monster children run home leaving a sea of their discarded playground balls. Every evening I gather these forgotten spheres of joy. For tomorrow at the start of recess they will come looking for their missing treasures in.... THE LOST AND FOUND!"

Take on the role as the keeper of the Lost and Found in a fun filled school for monsters. Marvel as their little faces come running past with their cute and endless demands for their lost property. Dig into the pit of their misplaced orbs and make a monster happy.

Race against the clock to return as many lost balls to the monster children as possible. Returning a ball with gusto will net you a time bonus, so be as quick as you can and make their little faces smile!

This game was made by for the Global Game Jam 2021 in 48 hours.

Credits: 

Peet Cooper (Art, Design)

Anthony Enright (Art, Design)

Nathan Buckley (Programming, Design
